value.title: Using Custom Format Strings in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Patrick walks you through how to use custom format strings in Power BI Desktop. From dates and time to numbers, he calls out some things to look out for. value.title: ConcatenateX in Power BI and DAX   Concatenate Values of a Column

value.excerpt: Customer retention is one of the most common scenarios of data analysis, which is very useful for business.
